description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. You are the Lone Gunner.  Face off against deadly enemies with your ship's unique weapons and the ability to control bullets mid-flight.  You control your ship equipment; choose from different weapons, ammo, accessories and mods that allow for thousands of unique ship setups. Can you survive 25 levels of intense action? Only one way to find out...
